page.title: 07TRANSPORT AND M1
page.content: Most residents in the area studied, rely on private transport.Although a railway line passes through Lowgates there is no station.All the villages have bus services which run about one bus every half an hour.The fare from Barlborough to Chesterfield is 75p for an adult.A major feature of the area is the M1,at junction 30.Below is a survey of vehicles travelling on the motorway during one hour between 1000 and 1200 on Wednesday 3rd July 1985. {cars}2055,{vans}1041,{lorries}1405, {tankers}85,{car transporters}11,{cars {and trailers}56,{military vehicles}3,{ {buses and coaches ect.}39,{horse boxes 2,{road repair vehicles}0,{pick up {trucks and landrovers}2,{security vans 1,{motor bikes}4. Total vehicles{4704.
